Title: Relates to designating a portion of the Mohawk-Hudson Bikeway as the "Ronald H. Miller Memorial Bike Trail"
Summary: Designates a portion of the Mohawk-Hudson Bike Hike Trail within the village of Menands as the "Ronald H. Miller Memorial Bike Trail".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the Mohawk-Hudson Bike Hike Trail as the "Ronald H. Miller Memorial Bike Trail"
